data.persona: I am a county hiker. I like to tramp through the forest. I love nature.
data.description:
You are in the Temple gardens.
The temple gardens are a beautiful place. There are many trees and flowers all over the Temple. There is a small water spring here.
There's a coin, a flower, a tree, and a small water spring here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to give a coin to the servant so that I can receive permission to speak to the head cleric of the Temple, and ask if I can have permission to collect some plant samples.
data.mid_motivation: I want to collect many seedlings and cuttings from the rare plants seemingly found only found in this temple garden.
data.long_motivation: I want to take these seedlings and cuttings back to my home village in hopes of creating a garden of these rare plants. I also wish to give some samples to a local wizard to research any magical or healing properties of these plants.
